topic.title: What is Ratio?
topic.body:
I am sorry if this has already been answered, but I am currently unable to find what Ratio means.
For context:
ZeroUp uses it: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/
and YouTube(ZeroNet) uses it: http://127.0.0.1:43110/149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCUXzaCN/

1511133140_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL.body: It's a great website, but I think it could use a name change and stuff.
